confirmUpdateText.en: Some of your data was managed in a newer version of Anytype. Please update the app to work with all your docs and the latest features.
confirmUpdateText.cn: 您的一些数据是由新版本的Anytype中添加的。请更新应用程序以使用您的所有文档和最新功能。

authInviteLabel.en: Enter your invite code. If you don't have one, visit anytype.io to register for early access. We are inviting new testers on a rolling basis.
authInviteLabel.cn: 输入您的邀请代码。 如果您没有邀请, 请访问 anytype.io 加入我们的早期访问计划. 我们将逐步邀请更多的测试人员。

authSelectLabel.en: For those who celebrate trust & autonomy. Anytype is your safe space to write, plan, think and organise everything that matters to you.
authSelectLabel.cn: 为了注重自由 & 安全的你， Anytype 会将为你的创作、计划、思考或你所重视的一切构建在一个安全的空间。

authLoginLostPhrasePopupContent.en:
Anytype cannot recover recovery phrase for you

There is technically no possible way access it, as it's not stored on Anytype side. Check out the places where it can be stored:

  • In system password storage. We did it for you automatically
  • Inside a password manager if you use one
  • On a piece of paper stored in a secure place chosen prior
authLoginLostPhrasePopupContent.cn:
Anytype无法为您找回恢复短语

从技术上讲，我们不可能访问它，因为它没有存储在Anytype。查看恢复短语可能存在的地方:

  • 系统密码存储中可能会存在自动为你保存的恢复短语
  • 如果您使用密码管理器，您可以在其中查找一下
  • 最后，希望您有将恢复短语记录在某个安全的地方

authRegisterTitle.cn: 添加名称和个人资料图片

authDeleteTitleDeleted.en: Account data removed from the backup node
authDeleteTitleDeleted.cn: 从备份节点中删除的帐户数据

authDeleteDescription.en: We're sorry to see you go. Once you request your account to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your account data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
authDeleteDescription.cn: 关于您的离开我们很抱歉。一旦您发出删除帐户的深情，您会有30天的时间取消此申请。30天后，您的帐户数据将从所有备份节点中永久删除，您将无法在新设备上登录Anytype，同时也无法找回您的所有数据。

authDeleteDescriptionDeleted.en: All logged-in devices may have your data locally. However, you are not able to sign into Anytype on new devices using your keychain phrase.
authDeleteDescriptionDeleted.cn: 您在其他登陆设备中所同步的数据并不会被删除。但是，您将无法使用恢复短语在新设备上登录Anytpe。

authDeleteRemovePopupTitle.en: Are you sure you want to delete your local account data?
authDeleteRemovePopupTitle.cn: 您确定要删除本地帐户数据吗？

authDeleteRemovePopupText.en: These objects will be deleted irrevocably. You can't undo this action.
authDeleteRemovePopupText.cn: 这些对象的数据将被永久删除，此操作为不可逆转的！

authOnboardVoidLabel.en: It is an encrypted location for everything you create. Everything is stored on your device, and backed up to the distributed network.
authOnboardVoidLabel.cn: 它是您创建的所有内容的加密位置。所有内容都存储在您的设备上，并备份到分布式网络当中。

authOnboardPhraseLabel.en: Your data is encrypted by the Key below - your secret Recovery phrase. Store it securely. This is the only way to login and access your Void. ?
authOnboardPhraseLabel.cn: 您的数据由下面的密钥加密-您的恢复短语。 安全存放。这是登录和访问您的空间的唯一方法。 ?

authOnboardPhraseTooltip.en:
How do I protect my recovery phrase?
  • If you have system password storage, this will be done automatically when you create your account.
  • You can keep a copy inside your password manager, if you use one.
  • Writing it down and keeping it in a safe, secure place is another good option.
authOnboardPhraseTooltip.cn:
我如何保护我的恢复短语？
  • 如果您有系统密码存储，这将在您创建帐户时自动完成存入。
  • 您可以在密码管理器中保留一份副本。
  • 或者，将其写下来并将其保存在安全可靠的地方是另一个不错的选择。

authOnboardPhraseMoreInfoPopupContent.en:
No passwords here: Anytype uses a recovery phrase to protect your account and encrypt your data
  • The phrase is a randomly generated 12-word mnemonic from your device (not our servers).
  • No one can access your account without your recovery phrase.
  • This phrase ensures that you are the sole owner of your data.
Think of it like a key: If you lose your recovery phrase, there is no way to get it back
  • To protect your privacy, Anytype is not able to store, access, reset, or change your recovery phrase, ie: only you hold the key.
  • Anytype will never reach out to ask for your recovery phrase.
  • Sharing the phrase is equivalent to sharing ownership of your account.
  • The ordering of the words in your recovery phrase matters.
authOnboardPhraseMoreInfoPopupContent.cn:
这里没有密码：Anytype 使用恢复短语来保护您的帐户并加密您的数据
  • 该短语是从您的设备（而非我们的服务器）随机生成的 12 个单词助记符。
  • 没有恢复短语，任何人都无法访问您的帐户。
  • 该短语可确保您是数据的唯一所有者。
将其视为一把密钥：如果您丢失了恢复短语，则无法获取
  • 为了保护您的隐私，Anytype 无法存储、访问、重置或更改您的恢复短语，即：只有您掌握密钥。
  • Anytype 绝不会主动询问您的恢复短语。
  • 共享该短语相当于共享您帐户的所有权。
  • 恢复短语中的单词顺序很重要。

authOnboardOfflineLabel.en: Your data is kept locally on your device. A connection to the Internet is needed only to synchronize your data across devices or back it up to the distributed network
authOnboardOfflineLabel.cn: 您的数据保存在您的本地设备上。 只需连接到互联网即可跨设备同步数据或将其备份到分布式网络

authOnboardSoulLabel.en: Great! As a last step, let's create your Identity and enter your name. Don't worry – you can always change the name later.
authOnboardSoulLabel.cn: 好的！ 最后一步，让我们创建您的身份并输入您的姓名。 不用担心，您以后随时可以更改名称。

authOnboardSpaceCreatingTitle.cn: 正在初始化您的个人空间...

authUsecaseLabel.en: 我们将加载一些模板辅助您开始使用Anytype

authUsecaseCase1Label.en: Manage your personal projects and tasks with complete privacy
authUsecaseCase1Label.cn: 以完全的隐私管理您的个人项目和任务

authUsecaseCase2Label.en: Create your own base of knowledge with books, movies, recipes, and more
authUsecaseCase2Label.cn: 用书籍、电影、食谱等创建你自己的知识库

authUsecaseCase3Label.en: Keep your daily notes and self-reflections secure and private
authUsecaseCase3Label.cn: 确保您的日常笔记和自我反思安全且私密

popupSettingsAppearancePersonalisationSi.cn: 自动显示和隐藏侧边栏

popupSettingsWallpaperText.en: Choose or upload the wallpaper. For best results upload high resolution images.
popupSettingsWallpaperText.cn: 选择或上传壁纸。为了获得最佳效果，请上传高分辨率图像。

popupSettingsMobileQRSubTitle.en: Log in your account on Android and iOS

popupSettingsMobileQRText.en: Launch Anytype app, tap “Login” and then “Scan QR code”. Reveal and scan the code below to login to your account.
popupSettingsMobileQRText.cn: 启动 Anytype 应用程序，点击“登录”，然后点击“扫描二维码”。 显示并扫描下面的二维码以登录您的帐户。

popupSettingsPhraseStub.en: You take the red pill, you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.
popupSettingsPhraseStub.cn: You take the red pill, you stay in Wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes.

popupSettingsPhraseShowPhrase.cn: 显示并复制恢复短语到剪切板

popupSettingsPhraseText.en: Your Recovery phrase protects your account. You'll need it to sign in if you don't have access to your devices. Keep it in a safe place. Click to show:
popupSettingsPhraseText.cn: 您的恢复短语可以保护您的帐户。 如果您无法访问自己的设备，则需要它来登录。 将其保存在安全的地方。 点击显示：

popupSettingsPinText.en: The pin code will protect your recovery phrase. As we do not store your recovery phrase or pin code and do not ask for your e-mail or phone number, it is impossible to recover your data without this information. So, please, remember or write it down somewhere in a safe place.
popupSettingsPinText.cn: Pin码用来保护您的恢复短语。 我们不会存储关于您的任何身份信息（比如恢复短语、Pin码、电子邮箱或电话号码），因此没有恢复短语就不可能恢复您的数据。所以，请牢记您的Pin码与恢复代码，并将它保存在安全的地方！

popupSettingsPinVerify.en: To continue, first verify that it's you. Enter current pin code
popupSettingsPinVerify.cn: 在继续之前, 我们要先验证一下您的身份. 输入当前Pin码

popupSettingsPinSelectError.en: Pin codes do not match, please try again
popupSettingsPinSelectError.cn: 两次输入的Pin码不匹配，请重试

popupSettingsDataManagementLocalStorageT.en: In order to save space on your local device, you can offload all your files to our encrypted backup node. The files will be loaded back when you open them.
popupSettingsDataManagementLocalStorageT.cn: 为了节省本地设备上的空间，您可以将所有文件传输到我们的加密备份节点。 当您打开这些文件时，它们将被重新加载。

popupSettingsDataManagementDeleteText.en: Once you request your account to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your encrypted account data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
popupSettingsDataManagementDeleteText.cn: 一旦您请求删除您的帐户，您有 30 天的时间取消此请求。 30 天后，您的加密帐户数据将从备份节点永久删除，您将无法在新设备上登录 Anytype。

popupSettingsSpaceIndexDescriptionPlaceh.en: Add a few words about the space...
popupSettingsSpaceIndexDescriptionPlaceh.cn: 添加几个关于空间的单词...

popupSettingsSpaceIndexSpaceTypePersonal.en: This space was created with end-to-end encryption, ensuring the privacy and security of user data and allowing for confident online or offline interaction.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexSpaceTypePersonal.cn: 这个空间是通过端到端加密创建的，确保了用户数据的隐私和安全，并允许自信的在线或离线时使用。

popupSettingsSpaceIndexStorageText.en: You can store up to %s of your files on our encrypted backup node for free. If you reach the limit, files will be stored only locally.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexStorageText.cn: 您可以在我们的加密备份节点上免费存储最多 %s 个文件。 如果达到限制，文件将仅存储在本地。

popupSettingsSpaceIndexHomepageDescripti.en: Select an object to show when you login
popupSettingsSpaceIndexHomepageDescripti.cn: 选择登录时要显示的对象

popupSettingsSpaceStorageManagerDeletion.en: Are you sure you want to delete %s %s?
These objects will be deleted irrevocably. You can't undo this action.
popupSettingsSpaceStorageManagerDeletion.cn: 这些对象将被永久删除。 您无法撤消此操作。

popupSettingsImportNotionExampleStep1.en: Select the page you wish to import

popupSettingsImportNotionExampleStep2.en: Click the three dots menu in the top-left corner
popupSettingsImportNotionExampleStep2.cn: 单击左上角的三点菜单键

popupSettingsImportNotionExampleStep3.en: Chose the export format: Markdown & CSV
popupSettingsImportNotionExampleStep3.cn: 选择导出格式: Markdown & CSV

popupSettingsImportNotionExampleComplete.en: Then, select either a Zip archive or Markdown file (.md) to complete the import
popupSettingsImportNotionExampleComplete.cn: 然后，选择 Zip 存档或 Markdown 文件 (.md) 以完成导入

popupSettingsImportCsvText.en: Select a Zip archive or CSV file (.csv) to complete the import
popupSettingsImportCsvText.cn: 选择 Zip 存档或 CSV 文件 (.csv) 以完成导入

popupSettingsExportText.en: Choose application or format of data source
popupSettingsExportText.cn: Choose application or format of data source

popupSettingsExportMarkdownText1.en: All your workspace data except columns and text color styling will be exported to markdown. It's a free and readable format that can be opened and edited with many free and beautiful applications.
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText1.cn: 除了列和文本颜色样式之外的所有工作区数据都将导出到 Markdown。 它是一种免费且可读的格式，可以使用许多免费且美观的应用程序打开和编辑。

popupSettingsExportMarkdownText2.en: If you want to add all your data back in Anytype, use the Import section.
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText2.cn: 如果要将所有数据重新添加到Anytype中，请使用 导入 。

popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextRe.en: Reader can see space contents (objects and members) but can’t edit objects or space settings, or invite other members to collaborate
popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextRe.cn: 访客可以看到空间内容 (对象和成员)，但不能编辑对象或空间设置，也不能邀请其他成员进行协作

popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextEd.en: Editor can can edit objects and invite other members to collaborate but can’t edit space settings.
popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextEd.cn: 编辑权限可以编辑对象并邀请其他成员进行协作，但不能编辑空间设置。

popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextAd.en: Admin can do everything in this space including moving it to the bin.
popupSettingsSpaceInviteMemberTypeTextAd.cn: 管理员可以在此空间中执行所有操作，包括将其移至垃圾箱。

survey0Text.en: Hi there, We hope you're enjoying your experience in Anytype! We'd love to hear your feedback so we can keep improving the product.
survey0Text.cn: 您好，我们希望您享受 Anytype 的体验！ 我们很乐意听到您的反馈，以便我们不断改进产品。

survey1Text.en: We'd love to learn more about why you've chosen to delete your account. Would you be willing to take 3 minutes to help us improve?
survey1Text.cn: 我们很想了解更多关于您选择删除帐户的原因。你愿意花3分钟来帮助我们改善吗？

survey2Text.en: Hi there! We'd love if you'd help us improve Anytype by taking part in this 5-minute survey.
survey2Text.cn: 你好！ 如果您愿意参与这个5分钟的调查来帮助我们改进 Anytype，我们将不胜感激。

survey3Text.en: Hi there, we hope you're enjoying your experience with Anytype! Would you take 5 minutes to help us improve our product?
survey3Text.cn: 您好，我们希望您享受 Anytype 的体验！ 您能花 5 分钟帮助我们改进我们的产品吗？
